skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To use this Skill, you first need a Mysa Smart Thermostat. Begin by downloading the latest Mysa app from the Android or iOS app store and follow the in-app instructions for setup.

Enable Voice Control by linking the Mysa Smart Thermostat Skill to your Amazon Alexa account through the Mysa app. Alternatively, you can activate the Mysa Smart Thermostat Skill in the Amazon Alexa app and link your accounts there. Once you navigate to “Discover Devices”, your Mysa Smart Thermostat should appear!

Now, you can control your Mysa Smart Thermostats with voice commands such as "Alexa, set the living room to X degrees.”

The full list of commands includes:

“Alexa, set [thermostat name] to X degrees”
“Alexa, increase [thermostat name] by X degrees”
“Alexa, decrease [thermostat name] by X degrees”
“Alexa, what is the [thermostat name] set to?”
“Alexa, what is the temperature of [thermostat name]?”
Be sure to replace [thermostat name] with the name of your thermostat, which can be set in the Mysa app.

If you have any questions, please contact support through the Mysa app.
